person.persName: Aylett Hawes Buckner (Winchester, Kentucky, clerk and court clerk)

body.p: Winchester, Kentucky, attorney, and court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Charlotte Forsythe on October 28, 1833. Father of Benjamin F. Buckner, Susan Buckner, and Daniel T. Buckner. Resident of Jacksonville, Illinois, in the 1830s. Attorney in Jacksonville. Editor of the Illinoian in Jacksonville in 1838. Relocated to Winchester. Attorney in Winchester. Member of the Whig Party. Clerk in Clark County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk of the Clark Circuit Court from 1858 to 1865. Hired one enslaved person in 1860.
